nodes.bodyText: What if user specifies VARCHAR(2147483647) in the schema and we convert it to string here? Will there be a problem?

VARCHAR(2147483647) is STRING in Flink.
We don't need support real VARCHAR(2147483647) in orc for hive 2.0. Hive don't have this type.
For newer versions, orc can schema evolution. So VARCHAR(2147483647) is supported.
Got it. Thanks for the explanation.
